text:
Stormpath | San Mateo, CA | https://stormpath.com | Full-time | Onsite

Position: Dev Ops Engineer

Stormpath is an authentication and user management service that helps developers quickly and securely build web and mobile applications.

Come join a team where you can have huge impact! We're looking for a versatile DevOps engineer to work primarily with Linux/AWS/Chef/Docker to support a Java environment.

We hire smart, fun, humble, and passionate people who love what they do and deliver quality work. We're trying to achieve something great, with great people.

Interested? Apply through our website or e-mail me directly: sarah@stormpath.com
